details:
adverb
- used as an intensive, extremely
= example: used as an intensive, extremely
= synonyms: insanely, deadly, deucedly, devilishly
- in an insane manner
= synonyms: insanely, crazily, dementedly
- in an uncontrolled manner
= example: in an uncontrolled manner
= synonyms: uncontrollably, frantically
